name: groth_verifier
description: groth zkSNARK algorithm verifier implementation in rust for NEAR smart contracts
author: jack the dev

scripts.build:lib: cd rust_verifier && RUSTFLAGS='-C link-arg=-s' cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:contract: cd rust_verifier_test && RUSTFLAGS='-C link-arg=-s' cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.test: yarn build && cd tests-rs && cargo test
